text: Tara sanghabad'dhabhabe'o tomadera birud'dhe yud'dha karate parabe na. Tara yud'dha karabe kebala suraksita janapade athaba durga pracirera arala theke. Tadera parasparika yud'dha'i pracanda haye thake. Apani taderake aikyabad'dha mane karabena; kintu tadera antara satadhabicchinna. Eta e karane ye, tara eka kandajnanahina sampradaya.
